title: Emote Error????
body:
So I've been playing league for a couple days until i met this frustratin error, which wont allow me to save my EMOTES setup??
Whenever i go ingame i got a emtpy rooster where the emotes used to be?? but its all empty.. then i tried to change it in my collection.. 
but then this error popped up:

"Sorry! Sometthing went wrong saving your emote loadout. Please try again or contact player support if the problem persists. Error code: EM03

idk what to do :/ .. as far as i remember, it takes like forever for riot support team to respond to tickets as far as i've experienced sadly :/ ... 

Sincerely 

Crispykittens, EUW,

replies.body: I've seen a couple players with this issue, and each of them was able to refresh the client to fix it. Try that really quickly for me and let me know if it's still not letting you save your emotes.
this works, however id have to do this after almost every game. please try to find a resolution soon.

If it's not permanently fixing it for ya, I'd suggest taking this a step further and trying a full repair as some of those files might be corrupted. If that still doesn't help, go ahead and hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
